text:
Kenneth Cordele Griffin (born October 15, 1968) is an American hedge fund manager and billionaire. He is the chief executive (CEO) of the investment firm Citadel, which he founded in 1990. He was born in Daytona Beach, Florida.
He is the richest man in Illinois. With total donations totalling $21.5 million the Field Museum of Natural History renamed their Griffin funded dinosaur exhibit the "Griffin Dinosaur Experience".
